title: Courts of Babylon: Tales of Greed and Glory in The Harsh New World of Professional Tennis
description: An expose+a7 of professional tennis and the celebrity cult surrounding it provides an insider's look--including overzealous parents, pampered athletes, sex, politics, commercialism, constant travel, and world-weariness--at those who have it all too fast and too young. 15,000 first printing.
author: Peter Bodo
